system.requirements: Dark Eldar, Power Through Pain, Corruption 10+
system.effect: The character adds the first digit of their Corruption Points in metres to the range they can gain Pain Tokens. (EG: 39 corruption = +3 Metres)

description.value: The character adds the first digit of their Corruption Points in metres to the range they can gain Pain Tokens. (EG: 39 corruption = +3 Metres)
